snippet: David Tyree and Victor Cruz, who are both from northern New Jersey, are two guys who came a long way in making their names as wide receivers for the Giants.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column; former New York Giants receiver David Tyree, who in 2008 had the headiest moment in Super Bowl history with a circus catch en route to a Giants championship, is reliving it some through the ascendance of current Giants receiver Victor Cruz; both men are from northern New Jersey and came a long way in making their names as wide receivers for the Giants.
lead_paragraph: David Tyree and Victor Cruz, who are both from northern New Jersey, are two guys who came a long way in making their names as wide receivers for the Giants.

headline.seo: David Tyree and Victor Cruz: Jersey Guys, Giants Guys
headline.main: United in Giants Lore and Shaped by Jersey Roots
headline.print_headline: United in Giants Lore and Shaped by Jersey Roots
